TITLE: The best white noise machines of 2021
SUMMARY: Noise can affect sleep for better or worse. White noise machines that emit just that — consistent noise — fall squarely in the "better" category. Thumping upstairs neighbors or a door slamming are in the "worse" category, but they don't wake you up just because they're loud; it's the sudden change in sound consistency that actually does that. Constant white noise like the kind produced by a white noise machine has been shown to improve sleep quality because it helps mask sudden bursts of noise that may help some people more easily fall and stay asleep.
